name: ボール (bōru)
description:
Choose your character and fight in this intense anime themed pong-like game!

Unlike normal pong, you can DASH, ATTACK and CONTROL the ball direction when hitting it. Don't let the ball become too slow on your field, or else your enemy may STOMP you!

Each character has its UNIQUE playing style and an one SPECIAL ABILLITY. Pick your favorite and become a master!

Play it on your phone! (doesn't work on all devices)
If no controls appear, try enabling Mobile Mode on settings

Controls (PC):
Player 1
W and S - Up and Down
A  - Dash (hold then choose direction)
D - Attack
E - Special Abillity (when available)
Q - Stomp (when available)

Player 2

Up and Down Arrows - Up and Down
Right Arrow  - Dash (hold then choose direction)
Left Arrow - Attack
Ctrl - Special Abillity (when available)
Shift - Stomp (when available)
